Detect Undead (Undeath1 Divi): R60' cone gives self info on undead auras for conc or 1 min

Fire Shield (Retribution4 Evoc): Cold or hot flames enveloping self inflict 1d6+1 HP upon foe hit, reduce heat or cold damage by half (DC 18 Ref no HP) for 1 rd
Gate (Drow9 Conj): R110' 5' - 20' disk connects to another plane for conc or 1 rd, allows summoning of extraplanar creature

Speak With Dead (Retribution3 Necr): R10' Self receives 0 answers from corpse (DC 17 Will neg)

Spiderform (Drow5 Tran): Self polymorphs into drider or monstrous spider for 1 hr

Suggestion (Drow3 Ench): R25' Target follows reasonable suggestion for 1 hr (DC 17 Will neg)
